title: luis4
author: luis4
content: Is there a prop firm for crypto?CFT offers the following benefits:No time limitSpreads from 0 pips1:100 leverageMore than 100 cryptocurrency pairs, 100 indices, currencies, commodities and stocks.You can choose to trade on MT5 or on the CFT platform, which has an amazing user interface

comments.author: Timmzzy
comments.body: Quote from: luis4 on November 08, 2023, 09:46:41 PMIs there a prop firm for crypto?CFT offers the following benefits:No time limitSpreads from 0 pips1:100 leverageMore than 100 cryptocurrency pairs, 100 indices, currencies, commodities and stocks.You can choose to trade on MT5 or on the CFT platform, which has an amazing user interfaceThis would have been amazing if we should have such, even prop firm for synthetic indices but too bad such is not happening just for forex alone but some brokers depending on the prop firm the broker is with they do offer crypto trading.

comments.author: borovichok
comments.body: Quote from: luis4 on November 08, 2023, 09:46:41 PMIs there a prop firm for crypto?CFT offers the following benefits:No time limitSpreads from 0 pips1:100 leverageMore than 100 cryptocurrency pairs, 100 indices, currencies, commodities and stocks.You can choose to trade on MT5 or on the CFT platform, which has an amazing user interfaceProp firm accounts are mainly for traders who believed themselves, they're ready to step up their game and ensure they're winning in all rounds of the market. I've no seen prop firm accounts relatable to crypto, rather there's golden chances of embracing good chances of earning and also losing in the system. I rather choose forex when it comes to emphasize made on prop firm accounts, Forex is consider the best option when it comes to choosing the best prop firm accounts, a trader could easily find one and make good use of them.

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: I think like 10 years ago or so I joined a prop firm. They had some crappy ad while driving one day and I decided to try it out.Was a disaster. Basically when you were new, your losses were capped. So unless you knew what you were doing at the beginning you would never make any decent money. Also the rest of the group had no idea what they were doing either. I donâ€™t think anyone there was a successful trader. A year later I think the place just shut down.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: Timmzzy on December 04, 2023, 06:16:58 PM>>snip<< Quote from: borovichok on December 18, 2023, 10:37:58 PM>>snip<<Quote from: adaseb on December 19, 2023, 05:58:10 AM>>snip<<Don't be fooled folks, OP is a shill of a certain fake website and this time round he has abbreviated it as CFT, but he has been shilling this so-called prop firm for a while using very many fake accounts like in this case Do not trust anything OP spills here.
